CDSCurrentDate: The date of your confirmation statement is:
CDSCurrentDateExplainer: This date is 12 months after the last confirmation statement, or 12 months after the limited partnership's registration date.
CDSDateChangeExplainer: You can change the date of the confirmation statement if you want to file early. This will start a new 12 month review period, and change the date of future confirmation statements.
CDSRadioButtonError: Error: Please select yes or no
CDSRadioButtonQuestion: Do you want to change the date of your confirmation statement?
CDSRadioButtonYesExplainer: Enter the date of your confirmation statement
